Sentencas: (3YSZ)(1-x)-(MgO)(x) form composites above x = 0.15, which consist of stabilized-zirconia and magnesia.
Titulo: Influence of impurities on the conductivity of composites in the system (3YSZ)1-x-(MgO)x

Sentencas: Electrical conductivities of the two-phase composites were measured by the four-probe DC technique.
Titulo: Influence of impurities on the conductivity of composites in the system (3YSZ)1-x-(MgO)x

Sentencas: Negative influences of impurities such as SiO2 on the conductivity are discussed with the aid of microstructural investigations using SEM and TEM.
Titulo: Influence of impurities on the conductivity of composites in the system (3YSZ)1-x-(MgO)x

Sentencas: In the investigated composites, the impurities do not directly affect the electrical conduction as current blockers at grain boundaries as usually observed in pure YSZ electrolytes.
Titulo: Influence of impurities on the conductivity of composites in the system (3YSZ)1-x-(MgO)x

Sentencas: Microstructural investigation using HRTEM revealed that grain boundaries of the stabilized zirconia are very clean because the silicon and aluminum oxide impurities react with MgO to form discrete Mg2SiO4 and MgAl2O4 grains in the electrolytes, respectively.
Titulo: Influence of impurities on the conductivity of composites in the system (3YSZ)1-x-(MgO)x

Sentencas: A theoretical approach taking into consideration continuous volumes of existing phases reveals that the conductivity of the two-phase composites depends on the phase continuity.
Titulo: Influence of impurities on the conductivity of composites in the system (3YSZ)1-x-(MgO)x

Sentencas: The reduction of the continuity of the zirconia phase is the main reason for the decrease of conductivity in the present system.
Titulo: Influence of impurities on the conductivity of composites in the system (3YSZ)1-x-(MgO)x
